scripts.count_output: echo "Number of lines in $npm_package_config_outLREFile $(cat $npm_package_config_outLREFile | wc -l) ($(cat $npm_package_config_outLREFile | wc -c) caracters)"
scripts.build: f() { tsx build.ts $npm_package_config_outLREFile $@ && node --check $npm_package_config_outLREFile && yarn count_output; }; f
scripts.buildcopy: f() { tsx build.ts $npm_package_config_outLREFile $@  && node --check $npm_package_config_outLREFile && (cat$npm_package_config_outLREFile | pbcopy); }; f
scripts.checkall: yarn ts-unused-exports tsconfig.json && yarn cspell && yarn tscheck && yarn eslint && yarn testsilent
